title: SecureX Orchestration out of Beta
summary: SecureX Orchestration is now Generally Available, and even more powerful with the two newly released workflows - Phishing and SolarWinds.

title: Get SecureX Ribbon for Chrome
summary: Add the new Ribbon extension to Chrome to kick off your investigations from any browser-based tool or intel blog source, and maintain context wherever you go.

title: Get SecureX Ribbon for Firefox
summary: Add the new Ribbon add-on to Firefox to accelerate incident response workflows, and improve threat hunting directly from your browser.

title: SecureX Webinars & Training Videos
summary: Join Cisco experts in December & January for these live sessions: "Feature Deep Dive: Custom Security Events" and "ISE 3.0 - Posture & Compliance"

title: New SecureX Microsite on Devnet
summary: For users who want to extend SecureX capabilities by using the available APIs or writing their own orchestration workflows, we have launched a new SecureX Devnet Microsite. This resource is a valuable collection of links to relevant blogs, videos, training, and code examples...
